text: The Solomon Sea is a sea in the Pacific Ocean. It is between Papua New Guinea and the Solomon Islands. Many major battles were fought there during World War II. The Solomon Sea includes the New Britain Trench. It reaches its maximum depth at 29,988 feet (9,140 m) below sea level. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Seas of the Pacific Ocean Category:Bodies of water of Oceania Category:Geography of Papua New Guinea Category:Geography of the Solomon Islands
title: Solomon Sea
